text: long time ago in “a special pre-existent place”—a place known to the Acoma as Ha Ku, to the Mayan as Hunab Ku—the Egyptian Ku, to the Lakotas’ Peschla. To the Dorothy in each of us, the Emerald City of OZ, the heavenly Tula...Tara...Home. Prepare for a new level of revelation. _____Philip L.Gruber Founder/Director, Quantum Access Group ________________________________ 1. Giovanni Pico della Mirandola, Oration on the Dignity of Man, trans. A. Robert Caponigri. Chicago: Gateway Editions, 1956. 2. Aldous Huxley, The Perennial Philosophy, 1944-1945 Harper and Row Perennial Library. 3. Jan Van Ruysbroeck, London 1916 x
